note:
Dad, network guy, trying to be a good human. By day I make computers talk to each other as a networking person, and in the evenings I tend to not put computers down either by poking at home infrastructure or video games.

When I do get away from the screens I do ham radio and Iâ€™m trying to do more hiking and camping. I want to start canoeing and fishing with my sons.

I speak for myself; not another group, my employer, or any association.
